resources.string: When you need time to focus, you can pause distracting apps and hide their notification, pause them
The goal of this app is to track your use of your apps.\n This way, you have datas about the time you spend on your phone.\n Feel free to contribute !
In order to use this app, you need to grant special authorization.\nThis app will not upload any of your data on any server.
Avoid the background service to be killed by system
Report technical issues or suggest new features
